org.conqat.engine.commons.css

Class CSSMananger

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.conqat.lib.commons.html.CSSManagerBase
      • org.conqat.engine.commons.css.CSSMananger

  • public class CSSMananger
extends CSSManagerBase
    The CSS manager used for ConQATDoc. This class defines a number of basic classes that should be reused in other places. Furthermore it sets the default styles for some HTML elments.
